RFAMLOOK.title: RFAMLOOK
RFAMLOOK.description: $(document).ready(function() {$('input[type="text"].mrEdit').before('Hours: ');});(On average, how many hours a week do you spend...) ...looking after family members (e.g. children, elderly, ill or disabled family members)? If MARITAL = {married} Or (POSSLQ.ContainsAny({marliv,posslq}) Or POSSLQ.ContainsAny({marliv,posslq})) Then If MARITAL = {married} Or POSSLQ = {marliv} Or POSSLQY = {marliv} Then spousepartfill.Response = {spouse} spousepartfill2.Response = {spouse} Else spousepartfill.Response = {partner} spousepartfill2.Response = {partner} End If
